description: 1 x Ash (applicants ref. T1) - Reduce north side branch growing through neighbouring conifers back to the boundary, approx 5m. Reduce height of remaining tree by 5m. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Ash (applicants ref. T2) - Reduce down to a height of approx 6-8m to leave as habitat pole as the tree has numerous large branches falling off it which can be seen in the attached photos around the base of the tree. Old Innotus brackets can be seen around the base of the tree as well. GArden targets ont he other side of the boundary fence. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Ash (applicants ref. T3) - Reduce down to a height of approx 8m to leave as habitat pole as majroity of tree has died. Garden targets on the other side of the boundary fence. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Ash (applicants ref. T4) - Reduce back from over neighbouring garden by approx 3m. Reduce height by approx 3m. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
